title: Baidu plans Hong Kong IPO of AI chip unit Kunlunxin in spin-off move
description: Baidu has announced plans to spin off its artificial intelligence chip subsidiary, Kunlunxin, and list the new firm on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange.
content:
Chinese tech giant Baidu has announced plans to spin off its artificial intelligence chip subsidiary, Kunlunxin, and list it in Hong Kong, as more domestic chipmakers seek funds amid Beijing's push for semiconductor self-sufficiency.
The company said... [2672 chars]

title: Artificial intelligence to be at the heart of innovation in coming year
description: ‘After a year of cautious pilots, 2026 will see the Irish public sector accelerate AI adoption, with healthcare at the forefront’
content:
Artificial intelligence (AI) will be at the heart of all innovation in the year to come. From recruiters to software providers through broadly focused IT multinationals, and cybersecurity professionals, this will be the common theme for 2026.

title: South Korea Develops AI Model For A Custom Cancer Vaccine

title: Fractal to Clean Max: 5 IPOs worth about Rs 18,000 crore to watch out for in January 2026
description: India's primary market anticipates a busy January 2026. Five major IPOs, collectively worth nearly Rs 18,000 crore, are set to launch. These offerings span artificial intelligence, renewable energy, coal, lending, and hospitality. Companies like Fractal Analytics and Clean Max Enviro Energy Solutions are among those testing investor interest. This period will gauge market sentiment for new listings.
content:

title: Letters | How universities can rein in the abuse of AI
description: Readers discuss ways to ensure ethical artificial intelligence use in academia, the importance of activating Hong Kong’s emergency alerts, and the city’s healthcare fee hikes.

title: Five Wall Street investors explain how they’re approaching the coming year
description: Here’s how they are looking at artificial intelligence, interest rates and economic pressures.

title: Javed Akhtar calls out fake AI video, may move cyber police
description: A fabricated AI-generated video falsely depicting Javed Akhtar has brought renewed attention to the misuse of artificial intelligence in the entertainment sector, with public figures demanding legal safeguards and stricter cyber regulations.
content: Veteran lyricist and writer Javed Akhtar has fallen prey to the dark side of artificial intelligence, after a fake, AI-generated video falsely attributed a statement to him began circulating widely online. The fabricated clip shows a computer-generat... [1755 chars]

title: Orange County radiologists use AI to detect breast cancer earlier, saving lives
description: Providence St. Joseph Hospital in Orange County is pairing artificial intelligence with human expertise to detect breast cancer tumors earlier.
content:
ORANGE, Calif. (KABC) -- If radiologists can catch a breast tumor when it's two centimeters or less, doctors say the cure rate is 90 percent.

title: DeepSeek Touts New Training Method as China Pushes AI Efficiency
description: DeepSeek published a paper outlining a more efficient approach to developing AI, illustrating the Chinese artificial intelligence industry’s effort to compete with the likes of OpenAI despite a lack of free access to Nvidia Corp. chips.
